LOAD: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE);

GET.users.all: SELECT json_group_array(json_object('id', id, 'name', name, 'email', email)) FROM users;
GET.users.default: SELECT json_object('id', id, 'name', name, 'email', email) FROM users WHERE id = $1;

PUT.users.default: UPDATE users SET name = :name, email = :email WHERE id = $1;

PATCH.users.update_email: UPDATE users SET email = :email WHERE id = $1;
